product_name: CHANELULTRA LE TEINT Ultrawear All-Day Comfort Flawless Finish Foundation
summary: SummaryA full-coverage foundation that provides up to 24-hour wear* with a soft-matte finish. The lightweight texture glides seamlessly onto skin for all-day comfort.
details: DetailsFeaturesThe liquid formula provides buildable coverage that lasts in even environmentally strenuous conditions.Enriched with Luminous Perfection soft-focus powder, it conceals visible imperfections and illuminates for the look of smooth, even skin.*Clinical evaluation of 20 womenItem 2585239How To UseUsing fingers or a foundation brush, apply from the center of the face outward.IngredientsAqua (Water), Dimethicone, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tribehenin, Magnesium Sulfate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Parfum (Fragrance), [+ / - (May Contain), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Mica], IL41A-I.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using fingers or a foundation brush, apply from the center of the face outward.

reviews.headline: Flawless
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this foundation paired with the Chanel Enhancer - no primer needed and your makeup looks flawless all day. The foundation is matte and I am an older woman ( 45-50 years) that's why I prefer to pair with the enhancer.

reviews.headline: Worth the splurge
reviews.comments: Beautiful finish and buildable coverage. Would have liked a cooler fair shade but the lightest shade i was able to blend into my neck and make it work

reviews.headline: Perfect Lightweight Full-Coverage
reviews.comments: I have nothing bad to say about this foundation! It offers a stunning lightweight finish that is never cakey, even long after it has set in on your skin. One thing I really love about this product is that its lightweight qualities allow either a medium or full coverage look that is perfectly & easily buildable to your liking. It spreads on the skin easily as well and does not dry or set in too quickly. It is my favorite of all foundations by far!!!!!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I purchased this foundation with low hopes because I was not liking any of the Chanel products in the last decade and boy was I wrong! I have combo skin, used two pumps to get full coverage and was shocked by the results. Gave a soft matte finish with amazing plump, glowing looking skin. Worth the money but I will say prep your skin greatly so you can get your money's worth!

reviews.headline: Love it so far
reviews.comments: Good coverage, i got the perfect shade match, looks really great on the skin and it is lightweight. I will recommend buying this and use a good primer.

reviews.headline: Bad
reviews.comments: This isnt gor older women oxides after awhile on your face .nithin good in it to help skin ill be returning the bottke i pickup

reviews.headline: What I have been looking for!
reviews.comments: I love this full cover foundation. Goes on smooth, last all day, and makes my skin look naturally healthy. Also wonderful fragrance.

reviews.headline: The best foundation I ever try .
reviews.comments: Omg omg omg tye best of tte best i love how look ok my so natural loved loved loved

reviews.headline: A long-standing favorite
reviews.comments: Found just the right shade, and beautiful, silky coverage without being heavy

My skin type: combo to oily w some dry patches

I'm in love. I hate that i'm inlove with this becUze it's pricey. I bought it as a splurge for my wedding makeup but I already know I will be repurchasing. If you're combo to oily you def need a mattifying primer and/or setting spray. It's skin like and smells divine, definetly a luxury scent. If you're sensitive to fragance keep that in mind.

reviews.headline: Please make it in lighter shades! Some of us are pale.
reviews.comments: I loved this formula. It truly is long wearing, but you can't feel it. I didn't notice oxidation. My problem is that the lightest neutral and cool shades are still too dark.

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments: Smooth & silky

reviews.headline: Not worth the price
reviews.comments: This foundation has such a strong scent that it triggered my allergies and gave me a headache. I tried it for 3 days before returning it. Its light coverage but looks patchy on my combo skin. I wore it for 4 hours then on the last 2 days 9 hours and it looked so bad no powder could fix it. To top it off it transfers the moment you accidentally touch your face, it will come right off. Save your money, these reviews are false.

reviews.headline: So Orange now
reviews.comments: I keep going back to this foundation hoping I just got a bad bottle or they've fixed this problem but b20 is now much darker than my previous bottle. My old bottle is more of light beige skin-tone while this is justâ€¦ orange.

reviews.headline: Why did I not start using this sooner?
reviews.comments: Leaves my skin looking flawless and skin like. Lasted through airport travel with any smudges. Has a divine scent!

reviews.headline: Impeccable
reviews.comments:
Loving this foundation! Have tried many over the years and as I have aged I have had to become pickier in what I'm using. 

This foundation is excellent for women who ate experiencing wrinkles, oiliness, uneven skin, etc. I have some wrinkles, extreme oily skin, break outs, and skin disorders. This covers everything and stays perfectly in place all day! It does NOT settle in wrinkles! It is buildable! Easy to apply! 

Throwing out my MAC and Clinique and keeping Chanel! 

Only wish were they had paler not goldeny shades, since winter ive gotten whiter and my color no longer matches and doesn't come in a lighter shade.

If you're on the fence you will be really happy with this!!

reviews.headline: Long wear and the best color for medium skin tone
reviews.comments: Long wear and the best color for medium skin tone

reviews.headline: Long wear and the best color for medium skin tone
reviews.comments: Long wear and the best color for medium skin tone

reviews.headline: Perfect foundation for oily skin !!
reviews.comments: I've tried every foundation under the sun for oily skin and this is the only one that works for me. I still do need to touch up, but not too often. I pair it with the Secure the Sweat primer and Matte Milani Setting Spray and my makeup stays all day!

reviews.headline: A must have for mature skin
reviews.comments: I love this foundation. I'm 45 years old and whenever I wear this foundation, I get so many compliments on how beautiful my "skin" is.

media.headline: Please make it in lighter shades! Some of us are pale.
Please make it in lighter shades! Some of us are pale.

faceoff_positive.comments: I ordered this foundation after a girl in my dance class recommended it. It looked so beautiful and flawless on her skin, and she said it was long wearing, which I like in a foundation. I have normal skin, and I do get shiny in my T-zone, which is why I look for foundations with mattifying properties. I religiously used Estee Lauder's Double Wear, but sometimes it felt too heavy on my skin. I have tried a variety of foundations, both drugstore and high-end, but I have yet to find anything that stayed in place on my skin the way it did. I think this Chanel foundation is a contender! I was not sure about the shade since I ordered online, but it's a pretty close match. I have broken blood vessels in one cheek that I prefer to cover, and I thought this foundation did so beautifully. It was also had a buildible coverage that did not cake up. I liked the finish of the foundation, so I opted to not set it with powder. It looked fresh and beautiful, even hours later! The one thing I abhor about this foundation is the fragrance. Why is that in there? I don't understand the purpose and could honestly do without it. I get migraines regularly and some scents are triggering. I could see this one being one that might trigger a migraine; however, I did notice the scent faded pretty rapidly in my opinion. It's not a deal breaker because of how gorgeous the foundation wore on my skin, but I would not be upset if they removed the fragrance altogether! Definitely worth the extra cash if you feel like splurging on a foundation, but if I found anything cheaper that was comparable, I would probably go with that option over this pricey formula.
faceoff_positive.headline: Pleasantly surprised

faceoff_negative.comments:
even with a good primer this slid off my face in 2 hours. I will say it initially went on like a dream- good coverage & ultra smooth finish, i had high hopes i had finally found my HG. However, it broke apart and became an oily mess. I really expected more from this at this price. My skin is T zone oily.
So far Estee Lauder double wear has been the best and my go to.  it does look a bit cakey if applied to heavily though and emphasizes lines and wrinkles.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for oily skin
